applicationDisabled.title: We are currently experiencing a temporary issue with WalletConnect v2 integration.
applicationDisabled.desc: We are actively working to identify and implement a solution to restore the functionality as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding.

errorProtocol.title: The Dapp you’re trying to connect to isn’t up to date
errorProtocol.desc: WalletConnect V1 is no longer supported, and to ensure a smooth and secure connection, the Dapp you’re using must upgrade to WalletConnect V2.

sessionProposal.info: This app will be able to:

infoBullet.0: Check your account balance and activity

error.title: {{appName}} requested to connect to chains we don’t support yet
error.desc: We currently support Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Arbitrum, Optimism, Avalanche C-Chain, Ethereum Goerli and Optimism Goerli. We are adding new ones gradually.

modal.title: Do you really want to disconnect all your sessions?
modal.desc: You will need to re-connect to be able to interact with all the apps you were connected to.

emptyState.title: No active session, yet
emptyState.desc: Get started by connecting to an app.
